trans-unit.source: A class that enables you to associate easing functions with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> key frame animation.

This class is used as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleKeyFrameCollection> in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> to animate a <xref:System.Double> property value along a set of key frames.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe viene utilizzata come parte di un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleKeyFrameCollection> in combinazione con un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> animare un <xref:System.Double> valore della propriet√† in un set di fotogrammi chiavi.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleKeyFrame> interpolates between the <xref:System.Double> value of the previous key frame and its own value linearly with an easing function to produce its output value.
trans-unit.target: Questo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleKeyFrame> esegue l'interpolazione tra il <xref:System.Double> valore del fotogramma chiave precedente e un valore specifico in modo lineare con una funzione di interpolazione per produrre il valore di output.

trans-unit.source: XAML Object Element Usage
trans-unit.target: Utilizzo della sintassi XAML per gli elementi oggetto

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use key frames with easing functions associated with them to create an animation of a rectangle that contracts upward, slows down, then expands downward (as though falling), and then bounces to a stop.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare i fotogrammi chiave sono associate funzioni di interpolazione per creare un'animazione di un rettangolo che contratti verso l'alto, basso, quindi si espande verso il basso (presupponendo che rientrano) e quindi aperture arrestati.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingDoubleKeyFrame" /> class.
The initial <see cref="T:System.Double" /> value.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingDoubleKeyFrame" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Double" /> value.
The initial <see cref="T:System.Double" /> value.
The initial key time.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingDoubleKeyFrame" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Double" /> value and key time.
The initial <see cref="T:System.Double" /> value.
The initial key time.
The easing function.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingDoubleKeyFrame" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Double" /> value, key time, and easing function.
Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> derived class.
When creating a derived class, you must override this method.
The new instance.
Animation classes inherit indirectly from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>.
trans-unit.target: Le classi di animazione ereditano indirettamente da <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>.

trans-unit.source: Because of this, you need to override the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A> method to construct a custom animation object.
trans-unit.target: Per questo motivo, √® necessario eseguire l'override di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A> metodo per costruire un oggetto di animazione personalizzata.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a typical implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrata un'implementazione tipica di <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the easing function applied to the key frame.
The easing function applied to the key frame.
trans-unit.target: La funzione di interpolazione applicata al fotogramma chiave.

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: Utilizzo della sintassi XAML per elementi propriet√†

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
*easingFunction*
Exactly one object element for an object that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase> and thus implements <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IEasingFunction>.
trans-unit.target: Elemento esattamente un oggetto per un oggetto che deriva da <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase> e che implementa <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IEasingFunction>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingDoubleKeyFrame.EasingFunction" /> dependency property.
The value to animate from.
A value between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive, that specifies the percentage of time that has elapsed for this key frame.
Interpolates, according to the easing function used, between the previous key frame value and the value of the current key frame, using the supplied progress increment.
The output value of this key frame given the specified base value and progress.
